2074.subject: MATH
2074.descrlong: Students assist local mathematics teachers in lesson design and construction, classroom instruction, and student assessment. Students deepen their understanding of basic mathematical principles, techniques, and methodologies for effective instruction , and gain community service experience through projects with schools and the community. Discussion focuses on issues of equity, diversity, and social justice in the context of mathematics and mathematics learning.(Offered fall semester.)

2124.subject: MATH
2124.descrlong: Service learning placements in middle or high schools help students deepen their understanding of mathematical principles, techniques, and methodologies for effective instruction. Students also study how issues of social justice and equity affect mathematical literacy and why it is important for everyone to be mathematically literate.  (Offered fall semester)
